questions.questionText: Have you at any point been a Community Supporter on RPG Crossing?
Have you at any point been a GM on RPG Crossing?
I am willing to be contacted later if there are any questions about my responses.
How did you find out about RPG Crossing?

options.value: Link from Google+ (the social media site, not search)

questions.questionText: Which systems do you prefer?

Are you aware of the benefits of CS memberships, including ad-free play, a mobile style (currently CS-only, but this feature will ultimately be for everyone), larger avatars, invisible browsing, and a larger pm box?
If you are not a CS member, why not?

options.value: Don't think it's worth the price

questions.questionText: Which of the following additional site features are you aware of?

Would you like an easy way to share your games on Facebook?
Would you like a way to share choice moments from your games on Twitter?

Are you playing in as many games as you'd like?
Can you explain why not?

How satisfied are you with our character sheets?

options.value: I have not used this feature

What is your most frequent entry page into the site?

options.value: Game page (one or more of your game forums)

questions.questionText: What would most improve your experience on the site?
If you have or had a monthly subscription, why a monthly subscription instead of a yearly subcription?
What do you / did you like most about being a CS (select all that apply)?

options.value: I get a lot out of this site, and it's cheap compared to the returns
The site supporting the Brain and Behaviour Research Foundation in the December drive

questions.questionText: Do you / did you use the mobile style/interface?
What additional CS features would you like?

options.value: Ability to award more RPXP per hit
The ability for GMs to customize the look of their game forums
A higher tier of CS to give the site more support, with additional perks
Better support for putting all of a GM's games into a master folder
